metadata.name: Cozy Village River Night #1/30
metadata.description:
“As you wander the wooden pathways, you can't help but feel a sense of romance in the air. The lanterns create a cozy atmosphere, inviting you to take a leisurely stroll with your loved one. The cool night air is refreshing, and the scent of candles and floral trees fills your senses. You pass by charming cottages with thatched roofs and flower boxes bursting with color as the moonlight and stars complete the mood.”

This piece is the first official digital artwork created and minted by ChrisL for the secondary market.
